lead_paragraph: A statue of Zlatan Ibrahimovic will be erected outside the Friends Arena in Stockholm, the Swedish FA (SvFF) announced on Monday as the giant striker won the Golden Ball award for the country's best male player for the 10th year in a row.

headline.print_headline: Swedish FA Plans Zlatan Statue as He Wins 11th Golden Ball
headline.main: Swedish FA Plans Zlatan Statue as He Wins 11th Golden Ball

snippet: A statue of Zlatan Ibrahimovic will be erected outside the Friends Arena in Stockholm, the Swedish FA (SvFF) announced on Monday as the giant striker won the Golden Ball award for the country's best male player for the 10th year in a row....
